## canvasToImage() function

将 Canvas 转换为图像对象

**Signature:**

```typescript
canvasToImage: (canvas: HTMLCanvasElement, quality?: number) => HTMLImageElement
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ 图像质量，范围在 0 到 1 之间，默认为 1


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

HTMLImageElement

转换后的图像对象
